attributes.action: fund the remaining £500,000 needed to continue the work of the Recurrent Miscarriage Clinic at St Mary's Hospital, London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professor Lesley Regan of St Mary's London is a remarkable woman. Her and team work tirelessly to find solutions to recurrent miscarriage, stillbirth and ectopic pregnancy. They not only try to save people's babies, but they also treat everyone as an individual. They recognise people's fears and distress and work positively to find a happy ending. The professor shouldn't have to raise £1million to keep these services going, it should be provided by the goverment. Maybe our new Prime Minister will understand the importance of their work?
